targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	sum(charge_energy_used)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id;

SELECT
	sum(charge_energy_used)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id
	AND cost = 0;

WITH energy as(
SELECT
	sum(charge_energy_used) AS charged_kWh
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id),
since as (
	SELECT date FROM positions
	WHERE car_id = $car_id
	ORDER BY date ASC
	LIMIT 1
)
SELECT (energy.charged_kWh / $distance_driven) as "kwh_per_$length_unit" FROM energy

SELECT
	count(*)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND charge_energy_used > 0.01
	AND car_id = $car_id;

panels.description: For this section, it's important that you have geo-fences called "Home" and "Work" if you want to see a bar with the energy charged on those places.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT location, SUM(charge_energy_used) AS Energy
FROM (
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN COALESCE(geofence.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(address.name, nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', address.display_name), '')))) ILIKE '%Home%' THEN COALESCE(geofence.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(address.name, nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', address.display_name), ''))))
	  WHEN COALESCE(geofence.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(address.name, nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', address.display_name), '')))) ILIKE '%Work%' THEN COALESCE(geofence.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(address.name, nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', address.display_name), ''))))
	  WHEN COALESCE(geofence.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(address.name, nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', address.display_name), '')))) ILIKE '%supercharger%' THEN 'Superchargers'
	  ELSE 'Other'
  END AS location, charge_energy_used
FROM
	charging_processes c
LEFT JOIN addresses address ON c.address_id = address.id
LEFT JOIN geofences geofence ON geofence_id = geofence.id
WHERE
	 car_id = $car_id
	AND $__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND c.charge_energy_used > 0
) ChargeLocations
GROUP BY location
ORDER BY Energy DESC

panels.title: Main locations

panels.description:
This dashboard is meant to have a look of all the charges in a given period (last 10 years by default). You can see the distance driven, number of charges, total charging cost, etc., both in summary or in separated lists.

You can expand/collapse the rows as needed.

From the Monthly Stats row, you will have a table with links to other Teslamate Dashboards to have a look on a specific period, charge or trip.

targets.rawSql:
WITH data AS (
  SELECT
		cp.id,
		cp.charge_energy_used,
		CASE WHEN NULLIF(mode() within group (order by charger_phases),0) is null THEN 'DC'
				 ELSE 'AC'
		END AS current
	FROM charging_processes cp
  RIGHT JOIN charges ON cp.id = charges.charging_process_id
  WHERE
	  cp.car_id = $car_id
	  AND cp.charge_energy_used > 0.01
	  AND $__timeFilter(start_date)
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
	now() AS time,
	sum(charge_energy_used) AS value,
	current AS metric
FROM data
GROUP BY 3
ORDER BY metric DESC;

panels.title: Summary AC/DC Energy Used

panels.description: Use the dropdown at the top to  choose the Geofence to display energy added from

targets.rawSql:
WITH free_energy AS (
SELECT sum(charge_energy_used) AS free_charged_kWh
FROM charging_processes cp
INNER JOIN geofences g ON g.id = cp.geofence_id
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id AND g.name = '$geofence'
GROUP BY g.name),
energy as(
SELECT
	sum(charge_energy_used) AS charged_kWh
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id
)
SELECT ($distance_driven * free_energy.free_charged_kWh / energy.charged_kWh) as "distance_$length_unit" FROM energy, free_energy

panels.title: Added at $geofence

targets.rawSql:
WITH free_energy AS (
SELECT sum(charge_energy_used) AS free_charged_kWh
FROM charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id
	AND cost = 0),
energy as(
SELECT
	sum(charge_energy_used) AS charged_kWh
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id
)
SELECT ($distance_driven * free_energy.free_charged_kWh / energy.charged_kWh) as "distance_$length_unit" FROM energy, free_energy

WITH suc_data AS (
	SELECT c.charging_process_id
	FROM charges c
	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
	LEFT JOIN addresses addr ON addr.id = cp.address_id
	LEFT JOIN geofences geo ON geo.id = geofence_id
	WHERE 
    cp.car_id = $car_id AND c.fast_charger_present
		AND COALESCE(geo.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(addr.name, nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', addr.display_name), '')))) ILIKE '%supercharger%'
    AND $__timeFilter(end_date)
	GROUP BY 1
), suc_energy AS (
  SELECT coalesce(sum(charge_energy_used), 0) AS charged_kWh
  FROM  charging_processes cp
  INNER JOIN suc_data ON suc_data.charging_process_id = cp.id
), energy AS(
  SELECT
	  sum(charge_energy_used) AS charged_kWh
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE $__timeFilter(end_date)	AND car_id = $car_id
)
SELECT ($distance_driven  * suc_energy.charged_kWh / energy.charged_kWh) as "distance_$length_unit" FROM energy, suc_energy;
SELECT $distance_driven as "distance_$length_unit"

SELECT
  $ACCost

SELECT
  $DCCost

SELECT
  $SucCost

SELECT
  $TotalCost

SELECT (
  SELECT sum(cost)
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE $__timeFilter(end_date) AND car_id = $car_id
) / $distance_driven * 100

SELECT (
  SELECT sum(cost)
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE $__timeFilter(end_date) AND car_id = $car_id
) / (
  SELECT sum(greatest(charge_energy_used, charge_energy_used))
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE $__timeFilter(end_date) AND car_id = $car_id
)

panels.description: Net is the efficiency while driving

targets.rawSql:
select 
  sum((start_[[preferred_range]]_range_km - end_[[preferred_range]]_range_km) * cars.efficiency) / sum(distance) * 1000 * 
    CASE WHEN '$length_unit' = 'km' THEN 1
         WHEN '$length_unit' = 'mi' THEN 1.60934
    END AS "consumption_$length_unit"
from drives 
inner join cars on cars.id = car_id
where 
  distance is not null and
  start_[[preferred_range]]_range_km - end_[[preferred_range]]_range_km >= 0.1 and
  car_id = $car_id

panels.title: Consumption (net)

panels.description: Gross is all consumption (including while idle, phantom drains, sentry mode, etc)

targets.rawSql:
WITH d1 AS (
	SELECT
		c.car_id,
		lag(end_[[preferred_range]]_range_km) OVER (ORDER BY start_date) - start_[[preferred_range]]_range_km AS range_loss,
		p.odometer - lag(p.odometer) OVER (ORDER BY start_date) AS distance
	FROM
		charging_processes c
	LEFT JOIN positions p ON p.id = c.position_id 
	WHERE
	  end_date IS NOT NULL AND
	  c.car_id = $car_id
	ORDER BY
		start_date
),
d2 AS (
SELECT
	car_id,
	sum(range_loss) AS range_loss,
	sum(distance) AS distance
FROM
	d1
WHERE
	distance >= 0 AND range_loss >= 0
GROUP BY
	car_id
)
SELECT
range_loss * c.efficiency / distance * 1000 *
  CASE WHEN '$length_unit' = 'km' THEN 1
       WHEN '$length_unit' = 'mi' THEN 1.60934
  END AS "consumption_$length_unit"
FROM
	d2
	LEFT JOIN cars c ON c.id = car_id

panels.title: Consumption (gross)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	COALESCE(geofence.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(address.name, nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', address.road, address.house_number), '')), address.city)) AS location,
	CASE
      WHEN SUM(charge_energy_used) < 1000 THEN SUM(charge_energy_used)::NUMERIC(4,0)::VARCHAR || ' kWh' 
      WHEN SUM(charge_energy_used) < 1000000 THEN (SUM(charge_energy_used) / 1000)::NUMERIC(9, 3)::VARCHAR || ' MWh' 
      WHEN SUM(charge_energy_used) >= 1000000 THEN (SUM(charge_energy_used) / 1000000)::NUMERIC(9, 3)::VARCHAR || ' GWh' 
   END as charge_energy_used, sum(cost) as "Cost"
FROM
	charging_processes c
LEFT JOIN addresses address ON c.address_id = address.id
LEFT JOIN geofences geofence ON geofence_id = geofence.id
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id
	AND charge_energy_used > 0
GROUP BY
	1
ORDER BY
	SUM(charge_energy_used) DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT
	COALESCE(geofence.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(address.name, nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', address.road, address.house_number), '')), address.city)) AS location,
	CASE
      WHEN SUM(charge_energy_used) < 1000 THEN SUM(charge_energy_used)::NUMERIC(4,0)::VARCHAR || ' kWh' 
      WHEN SUM(charge_energy_used) < 1000000 THEN (SUM(charge_energy_used) / 1000)::NUMERIC(9, 3)::VARCHAR || ' MWh' 
      WHEN SUM(charge_energy_used) >= 1000000 THEN (SUM(charge_energy_used) / 1000000)::NUMERIC(9, 3)::VARCHAR || ' GWh' 
   END as charge_energy_used, sum(cost) as "Cost"
FROM
	charging_processes c
LEFT JOIN addresses address ON c.address_id = address.id
LEFT JOIN geofences geofence ON geofence_id = geofence.id
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id
	AND cost > 0
	AND charge_energy_used > 0
GROUP BY
	1
ORDER BY
	SUM(charge_energy_used) DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT
	COALESCE(geofence.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(address.name, nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', address.road, address.house_number), '')), address.city)) AS location,
	CASE
      WHEN SUM(charge_energy_used) < 1000 THEN SUM(charge_energy_used)::NUMERIC(4,0)::VARCHAR || ' kWh' 
      WHEN SUM(charge_energy_used) < 1000000 THEN (SUM(charge_energy_used) / 1000)::NUMERIC(9, 3)::VARCHAR || ' MWh' 
      WHEN SUM(charge_energy_used) >= 1000000 THEN (SUM(charge_energy_used) / 1000000)::NUMERIC(9, 3)::VARCHAR || ' GWh' 
   END as charge_energy_used, sum(cost) as "Cost"
FROM
	charging_processes c
LEFT JOIN addresses address ON c.address_id = address.id
LEFT JOIN geofences geofence ON geofence_id = geofence.id
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id
	AND charge_energy_used > 0
	AND COALESCE(geofence.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(address.name, nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', address.display_name), '')))) ILIKE '%supercharger%'
GROUP BY
	1
ORDER BY
	SUM(charge_energy_used) DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT
	COALESCE(geofence.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(address.name, nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', address.road, address.house_number), '')), address.city)) AS location,
	CASE
      WHEN SUM(charge_energy_used) < 1000 THEN SUM(charge_energy_used)::NUMERIC(4,0)::VARCHAR || ' kWh' 
      WHEN SUM(charge_energy_used) < 1000000 THEN (SUM(charge_energy_used) / 1000)::NUMERIC(9, 3)::VARCHAR || ' MWh' 
      WHEN SUM(charge_energy_used) >= 1000000 THEN (SUM(charge_energy_used) / 1000000)::NUMERIC(9, 3)::VARCHAR || ' GWh' 
   END as charge_energy_used, sum(cost) as "Cost"
FROM
	charging_processes c
LEFT JOIN addresses address ON c.address_id = address.id
LEFT JOIN geofences geofence ON geofence_id = geofence.id
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id
	AND charge_energy_used > 0
	AND cost = 0
GROUP BY
	1
ORDER BY
	SUM(charge_energy_used) DESC
LIMIT 10;

WITH data AS (
SELECT
  duration_min > 1 AND
  distance > 1 AND
  ( 
    start_position.usable_battery_level IS NULL OR
    (end_position.battery_level - end_position.usable_battery_level) = 0 
  ) AS is_sufficiently_precise,
  NULLIF(GREATEST(start_ideal_range_km - end_ideal_range_km, 0), 0) AS range_diff,
  date_trunc('month', (start_date::TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE) AT TIME ZONE '$timezone') as local_period,
  drives.*
FROM drives
  LEFT JOIN positions start_position ON start_position_id = start_position.id
  LEFT JOIN positions end_position ON end_position_id = end_position.id)
SELECT
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM date_trunc('month', local_period))*1000 AS date_from,
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM date_trunc('month', local_period + ('1 ' || 'month')::INTERVAL))*1000 AS date_to,
  CASE 'month'
    WHEN 'month' THEN to_char(local_period, 'YYYY Month')
    WHEN 'year' THEN to_char(local_period, 'YYYY')
    WHEN 'week' THEN 'week ' || to_char(local_period, 'WW') || ' starting ' || to_char(local_period, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
    ELSE to_char(local_period, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
  END AS display,
  local_period AS date,
  convert_km(max(end_km)::integer - min(start_km)::integer, '$length_unit') AS sum_distance_$length_unit,
  convert_celsius(avg(outside_temp_avg), '$temp_unit') AS avg_outside_temp_$temp_unit,
  sum(distance)/sum(range_diff) AS efficiency
FROM data WHERE
  car_id = $car_id
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date DESC

WITH data AS (
  SELECT
    charging_processes.*,
    date_trunc('month', (start_date::TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE) AT TIME ZONE '$timezone') as local_period
    FROM charging_processes)
SELECT
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM date_trunc('month', local_period))*1000 AS date_from,
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM date_trunc('month', local_period + ('1 ' || 'month')::INTERVAL))*1000 AS date_to,
  CASE 'month'
    WHEN 'month' THEN to_char(local_period, 'YYYY Month')
    WHEN 'year' THEN to_char(local_period, 'YYYY')
    WHEN 'week' THEN 'week ' || to_char(local_period, 'WW') || ' starting ' || to_char(local_period, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
    ELSE to_char(local_period, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
  END AS display,
  local_period AS date,
  sum(greatest(charge_energy_used,charge_energy_used)) AS sum_consumption_kwh,
  sum(greatest(charge_energy_used,charge_energy_used)) / count(*) AS avg_consumption_kwh,
  sum(cost) AS cost_charges,
  count(*) AS cnt_charges
FROM data WHERE
  car_id = $car_id AND
  (charge_energy_used IS NULL OR charge_energy_used > 0.1)
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date

WITH data AS (
  SELECT
    drives.*,
    date_trunc('month', (start_date::TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE) AT TIME ZONE '$timezone') as local_period
  FROM drives)
SELECT
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM date_trunc('month', local_period))*1000 AS date_from,
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM date_trunc('month', local_period + ('1 ' || 'month')::INTERVAL))*1000 AS date_to,
  CASE 'month'
    WHEN 'month' THEN to_char(local_period, 'YYYY Month')
    WHEN 'year' THEN to_char(local_period, 'YYYY')
    WHEN 'week' THEN 'week ' || to_char(local_period, 'WW') || ' starting ' || to_char(local_period, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
    ELSE to_char(local_period, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
  END AS display,
  local_period AS date,
  sum(GREATEST(start_[[preferred_range]]_range_km - end_[[preferred_range]]_range_km, 0) * car.efficiency * 1000) / 
  convert_km(sum(distance)::numeric, '$length_unit') as efficiency_net_$length_unit
FROM data
JOIN cars car ON car.id = car_id
WHERE
  car_id = $car_id
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date

list.definition: SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value FROM cars ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC;
list.label: Car
list.name: car_id
list.query: SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value FROM cars ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC;

list.definition:
SELECT
	coalesce(sum(cost), 0)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id;
list.name: TotalCost
list.query:
SELECT
	coalesce(sum(cost), 0)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id;

list.definition:
WITH data AS (
	SELECT c.charging_process_id 
	FROM charges c
	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
	LEFT JOIN addresses addr ON addr.id = cp.address_id
	LEFT JOIN geofences geo ON geo.id = geofence_id
	WHERE 
	        cp.car_id = $car_id AND c.fast_charger_present
		AND COALESCE(geo.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(addr.name, nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', addr.display_name), '')))) ILIKE '%supercharger%'
	GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
        coalesce(sum(cp.cost), 0)
FROM
	charging_processes cp, data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(end_date)
  AND cp.id IN (data.charging_process_id);
list.name: SucCost
list.query:
WITH data AS (
	SELECT c.charging_process_id 
	FROM charges c
	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
	LEFT JOIN addresses addr ON addr.id = cp.address_id
	LEFT JOIN geofences geo ON geo.id = geofence_id
	WHERE 
	        cp.car_id = $car_id AND c.fast_charger_present
		AND COALESCE(geo.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(addr.name, nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', addr.display_name), '')))) ILIKE '%supercharger%'
	GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
        coalesce(sum(cp.cost), 0)
FROM
	charging_processes cp, data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(end_date)
  AND cp.id IN (data.charging_process_id);

list.definition:
WITH data AS (
	SELECT c.charging_process_id 
	FROM charges c
	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
	WHERE 
              cp.car_id = $car_id AND c.fast_charger_present
	GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
        coalesce(sum(cp.cost) - $SucCost , 0)	
FROM
	charging_processes cp, data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(end_date)
  AND cp.id IN (data.charging_process_id);
list.name: DCCost
list.query:
WITH data AS (
	SELECT c.charging_process_id 
	FROM charges c
	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
	WHERE 
              cp.car_id = $car_id AND c.fast_charger_present
	GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
        coalesce(sum(cp.cost) - $SucCost , 0)	
FROM
	charging_processes cp, data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(end_date)
  AND cp.id IN (data.charging_process_id);

list.definition:
WITH data AS (
	SELECT c.charging_process_id 
	FROM charges c
	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
	WHERE 
		cp.car_id = $car_id AND c.charger_voltage != 2
                AND c.fast_charger_present IS NOT true
        GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
       coalesce(sum(cp.cost) , 0)
FROM
	charging_processes cp, data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(end_date)
  AND cp.cost IS NOT NULL
  AND cp.id IN (data.charging_process_id);
list.name: ACCost
list.query:
WITH data AS (
	SELECT c.charging_process_id 
	FROM charges c
	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
	WHERE 
		cp.car_id = $car_id AND c.charger_voltage != 2
                AND c.fast_charger_present IS NOT true
        GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
       coalesce(sum(cp.cost) , 0)
FROM
	charging_processes cp, data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(end_date)
  AND cp.cost IS NOT NULL
  AND cp.id IN (data.charging_process_id);

list.definition: select current_setting('TIMEZONE'), name from pg_timezone_names where abbrev ~ '^[a-zA-Z]{3,4}$' and name not like 'posix%' order by 2;
list.name: timezone
list.query: select current_setting('TIMEZONE'), name from pg_timezone_names where abbrev ~ '^[a-zA-Z]{3,4}$' and name not like 'posix%' order by 2;

list.definition:
SELECT ROUND(convert_km((max(end_km) - min(start_km))::numeric, '$length_unit'),0) as "Mileage"
FROM drives WHERE car_id = $car_id AND $__timeFilter(end_date)
list.name: distance_driven
list.query:
SELECT ROUND(convert_km((max(end_km) - min(start_km))::numeric, '$length_unit'),0) as "Mileage"
FROM drives WHERE car_id = $car_id AND $__timeFilter(end_date)

list.name: geofence
list.query: SELECT name FROM geofences ORDER BY id
